com.dor.coupons.system.dao

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO

    This CompanyDAO interface is for reading and writing to the Company table in the database.

    The interfece has the following methods:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      Add a company to the database.
      java.lang.Iterable<Company> getAllCompanies()
      Get all existing companies from the database
      Company getCompany(long id)
      Get a company object according to a given id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
      Get all existing coupons from the database
      boolean login(java.lang.String companyName, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if company exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database.
      void removeCompany(Company company)
      Delete company from the database.
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      Update existing company object in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        void createCompany(Company company)
        Add a company to the database.
        Parameters:
        company - The company object you want to add to the database.

      • removeCompany

        void removeCompany(Company company)
        Delete company from the database.
        Parameters:
        company - The company object you want to delete from the database.

      • updateCompany

        void updateCompany(Company company)
        Update existing company object in the database.
        Parameters:
        company - The updated company object you want to replace in the database.

      • getCompany

        Company getCompany(long id)
        Get a company object according to a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the company you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Company object according to a given id.

      • getAllCompanies

        java.lang.Iterable<Company> getAllCompanies()
        Get all existing companies from the database
        Returns:
        Iterable of all the companies objects from the database.

      • getCoupons

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
        Get all existing coupons from the database
        Returns:
        Collection of all coupons objects from the database

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String companyName,
              java.lang.String password)
        Checks if company exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database.
        Parameters:
        companyName - Given company name String for login.
        password - Given company password String for login.
        Returns:
        Boolean of login success.
